content: Extension hose HIT-VL 16 ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners > Injectable mortar accessories- ### FEATURES:Features The use of piston plug and extension hose help to ensure the mortar injected into the drilled hole is consistent and free of air voids Allows more accurate injection of estimated chemical volume, minimizing wastage Applications Injecting Hilti HIT injectable mortal in a variety of conditions, including deep holes, overhead holes and underwater ### TECHNICAL DATA: Plug Diameter: 20 - 55 mm Technical Data | Plug Diameter | 20 - 55 mm ### ITEMS- 38249 - Extension hose HIT-VL 16 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x 12x2x10 000 Extension hose
